entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
